video:video.video:title: Challenges in mainframe operations
video:video.video:description: This video shows why you need AIOps in mainframe operations, the future trend of AIOps, and why you need IBM Z Operational Log and Data Analytics.

video:video.video:title: Overview of IBM Z Operational Log and Data Analytics
video:video.video:description: This video shows the product features and benefits of IBM Z Operational Log and Data Analytics.

video:video.video:title: Deep dive into IBM Z Operational Log and Data Analytics
video:video.video:description: This video shows how data flows through different components including ZCDP and the analytics platforms, and how to collect a specific data type to analyze CPU usage, which is a critical metric for IT operations.

video:video.video:title: Platforms introduction
video:video.video:description: This video shows the supported analytics platforms and data consumers like Z Data Analytics platform, Splunk, and the Elastic Stack.

video:video.video:title: Deploy the Z Operational Log and Data Analytics application on the Elastic Stack
video:video.video:description: This video shows how to deploy the IBM Z Operational Log and Data Analytics application on the Elastic Stack platform.

video:video.video:title: Deploy the Z Operational Log and Data Analytics application on Splunk
video:video.video:description: This video shows how to deploy the IBM Z Operational Log and Data Analytics application on Splunk.

video:video.video:title: Deploy the Z Common Data Provider
video:video.video:description: This video introduces the steps required to deploy the Z Common Data Provider.

video:video.video:title: Set up the Configuration Tool on Liberty
video:video.video:description: This video introduces how to set up the Configuration Tool on Liberty

video:video.video:title: Set up the Configuration Tool on z/OSMF
video:video.video:description: This video introduces how to set up the Configuration Tool on z/OSMF

video:video.video:title: Create a policy to stream operational data to analytics platforms
video:video.video:description: This video introduces how to create a policy to stream operational data to analytics platforms

video:video.video:title: Configure and start the Data Streamer and data gatherers
video:video.video:description: This video introduces how to configure and start the Data Streamer and data gatherers.

video:video.video:title: Access the Z Data Analytics platform
video:video.video:description: This video shows how to view streamed operational data via predefined dashboards and saved searches in the Z Data Analytics platform web interface.

video:video.video:title: Access the Kibana web interface
video:video.video:description: This video shows how to view streamed operational data via predefined dashboards and saved searches in the Kibana web interface.

video:video.video:title: Access the Splunk web interface
video:video.video:description: This video shows how to view streamed operational data via predefined dashboards and saved searches in Splunk web interface.

video:video.video:title: View events and insights on the Problem Insights GUI
video:video.video:description: This video shows how to view events and insights on the Problem Insights GUI.

video:video.video:title: CICS transaction performance data visualization and response time anomaly diagnosis
video:video.video:description: This video will introduce a typical use case of IBM Z Operational Log and Data Analytics - CICS transaction performance data visualization and response time anomaly diagnosis.

video:video.video:title: Create a custom dashboard to show z/OS syslog messages on ZDAP
video:video.video:description: This video provides step-by-step instructions on creating a custom dashboard for analyzing messages from the z/OS syslog.
